name: Stadio
description: A great collaborative solution for runners. Lima? Sao Paulo? Let's run together!
title: Redefining the jogging experience with friends
subtitle: Apple Watch design

seo.title: Stadio: UX for runners - Comandos
seo.description: In a pandemic that is not over yet, schedule and run with friends who are in another country with your apple watch.

sections.description: It is true that the pandemic transformed us and we can no longer meet friends to jog. Stadio has taken it as an emblem to jog with friends in other cities or countries. It works basically like a room to zoom in and out for a jog! In his first month of MVP he worked with 100 people and it was amazing to see his performance.

items.title: Paper first
items.description: To get started I needed a few blank pages and to answer these questions:
list: What is the day-to-day life of these people?
Why apple watch and not another device?
How important is it to run with other people?

items.title: Customer journey
list: Interviews with 20+ running enthusiasts
Designing a freemium business model

items.title: Organized and Simple
items.description: The flow of the app was designed based on current running apps to reduce the learning curve for our runner and what they expected.
list: 40+ runners to test in test phase
In the process we created the open rooms for running

sections.description: Check second by second how you perform against other competitors in the same race. May the fastest win!
sections.title: Motivation for running on your wrist

sections.description: You can organize sessions with friends or participate in other rooms with people from other cities or countries. Training has never been so much fun
sections.title: Create rooms or join in running with strangers

sections.description: Taking into account that the main running apps have not developed this feature very well. These were the results:
sections.title: Impact on people

name: mipOS POS
description: Underpinned by old operating systems, a great POS for the new generation of consumers.
shortDescription: A smart way to manage restaurants
title: A smart way to manage restaurants
subtitle: Web and tablet design

seo.title: mipOS POS: Easy restaurant management - Comandos
seo.description: Designed to innovate and make the experience of managing, serving customers and auditing restaurant chains incredible.

sections.description:
Intuitive management of dishes, diners and business puts everyone in a better mood and therefore provides quality service.

With this product, mipOS expanded to Chile, Mexico, Ecuador and Colombia.

sections.title: Your customers are hungry, treat them special

items.title: The challenge
items.description: We had to create a magical experience for everyone: Waiters, captains, diners and cooks.
list: Control and management of personnel
Notifications of orders to kitchen, bar area, management and orders via delivery apps
Management of single tables, combined tables, invoicing

items.title: Customer journey
list: Created with interviews to 10+ restaurants
Designed with the collaboration of waiters and restaurant managers

items.title: Defining the process
items.description: We visited restaurants, kitchens, dark kitchens and commissaries of large chain food stores. Our office was in a restaurant.
list: Customer journey for waiters, captains and management
Customer journey for inventory replenishment

sections.description: The integration of the entire business, including delivery app's, was so incredible that it accelerated its growth to 4 countries.
sections.title: A result as great as its purpose

comment.text: The whole process of creating this product was a roller coaster of findings and iterations at the hand of Commandos. I will definitely work with him again.

items.title: Constant testing
items.description: Week by week we held experience review sessions with managers, waiters and diners.
list: Control and management of personnel
Notifications of orders to kitchen, bar area, management and orders via delivery apps
Management of single tables, combined tables, invoicing

items.title: Usability + data
list: We improve all the reports that can exist in a restaurant. Which product has the best performance?
Usability testing + reporting = profit

items.title: Intuitive control
items.description: Manage all the chain's menus, branches and delivery app's in one place. No more scattered or outdated menu times.
list: Integrated with 5 delivery app's
Products with different images for distribution channels. Same as pricing and handling of combos.

name: RebajaTusCuentas
description: Making it less painful to ask for mortgages is the mission of RebajaTusCuentas. All without goin to the bank.
shortDescription: A financial platform built for scale and accessibility
title: A financial platform  for mortgage loans
subtitle: Web and responsive design

seo.title: RebajaTusCuentas: Mortgage loans in hours - Comandos
seo.description: A lot of data to guide a product used by thousands of people in 3 countries and more than 60M of investment at that time.

sections.description:
RebajaTusCuentas was born as Peruvian startup with the commitment to democratize access to mortgage loans in an underbanked country. It is a mortgages broker whit the support of 500 startup with presence in 3 countries and + 50M in loans granted.

It has been incredible to see the growth of RTC.

sections.title: Users who may have better interest rates

items.title: The challenge
items.description: Banked people who are unaware that they can get better interest rates for their mortgages. Bearing in mind that fintech services are new and may not generate much confidence.
list: Conveying strength and confidence
Pre-approved mortgages by banks and RebajaTusCuentas
Constantly communicate the status of your process

items.title: Customer journey
list: +40 telephone interviews and video calls
A slightly long tunnel but short in time compared to a traditional bank

items.title: Defining the process
list: The roadmap was created by a team. Taking into account time to experiment with prototypes.
We had up to 3 experiments to achieve the best registration process.

sections.description: Understanding users well facilitated expansion to 3 countries. In Peru, they went from being a mortgage broker to a direct mortgage provider.
sections.title: A result as great as its purpose

comment.text: Translating a lot of interviews and phone conversations from users, turning it into an incredible UX and all the expansion we had was largely thanks to Commands.

items.title: New brand image
items.description: We unified all RTC services together with a new corporate identity. We made attractive what is usually boring for users.
list: We unify all RebajaTusCuentas.com services under a single identity.

items.title: Exponential growth
list: Expansion to Peru, Colombia and Mexico.
In Peru we went from being a mortgage broker to delivering mortgages directly.
BBVA Peru acquires part of RTC’s operation.

name: mipOS Integrator
description: 1 or 40 Dark Kitchen, 1 or 100 restaurants. Everything in a tablet to manage thousands of orders by Delivery.
shortDescription: A better experience for Dark Kitchen
title: Manage several restaurants from dark kitchen
subtitle: Web and tablet design

seo.title: mipOS Interger: Multiple dark kitchens on one screen - Comandos
seo.description: +8 screens per kitchen summed up in 1 was the great result of mipOS Interger with Comandos. Have you ever managed a dark kitchen?

sections.description: Each brand has one tablet per delivery app. Now imagine having 30 brands. Restaurants - in this case Dark Kitchen - have a complex operation within a single kitchen. Many have a space set aside to store hundreds of tablets.

sections.title: One kitchen for many brands can be chaos

items.title: The challenge
items.description: Create a great product to simplify the operation of up to 40 tablets on a single device.
list: Hundreds of orders coming in at the same time
Order integrity
Order status and sales reports for each delivery app and each brand

items.title: Starting the process
items.description: In partnership with Muncher we visited dark kitchens. We learned about ordering and delivery problems.
list: Some had up to 40 brands.
Some with order delivery tracking problems.
Turn on and off the brands in the delivery apps according to schedules and eventualities of the day.

items.title: Customer Journey
list: We visited +5 Dark Kitchens to understand their daily life
On average, each kitchen served 30 brands in a single day. This translated into hundreds of menus, promotions and profit margins.

sections.description: Having the different menus of different brands on one screen with easy integration with mipOS accounts was the secret of its growth.
sections.title: All delivery apps and menu on a single screen

comment.text: Starting with Commands was accelerating everything from 0 to 100 in a matter of weeks. The best part: nothing was done without consulting UX and product adoption statistics.

sections.title: We eliminate all the tablets and we are left with only one

items.title: Maximum efficiency
items.description: A roadmap created by 3 teams: devs + designate + user priorities.
list: A new way to unify all menus: Uber Eats + Didi Foods + Rappi + iFood, among others.
Sever and data architecture to make the right decisions
Special attention to learn and shut down cooking from mipOS and not from every delivery app tablet

items.title: Order delivery control
list: We created a monitoring and delivery system unique in the market up to that moment.
The dark kitchen is able to know the real status of each order with the assigned delivery person.
Para la gerencia significó tener un gran control de la operación.

items.title: Thousands of orders without chaos
list: We increased the average ticket by 40% as a result of better menu control.
In an average integration of 4 delivery apps, we were able to reduce 2 jobs.
